column4: I'm trying to install Opera and I've downloaded a .deb file; what do I do with this?
yeah it has returned to prompt
after starting Opera; it's giving me an error about plugins: http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/6417
should I install Motif using Synaptic?
it's probably named something like openmotif or something
try searching from name AND description
I managed to break Synaptic's theme?
the theme has changed for some reason
it's not the KDE default now
the program? yes; but not a reboot
